Authentic Ayurveda, Yoga and Meditation in India
The birthplace of yoga, India is a country where holistic health is an everyday part of life. Ayurveda is practiced nationwide, a traditional Hindu system of medicine which balances the body and mind, using herbal treatments, yogic breathing and a dosha specific diet. Taking a
[luxury wellness retreat](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/ananda-ayurveda-luxury-india/) with us in India is an education in natural health!
India excites and envelopes you from the moment of arrival. The tantalising sights, smells and sounds are intoxicating and the experiences are as diverse as the country itself. You can take part in a traditional Aarti fire ceremony by the banks of the Ganges in the North at sunrise or sail through the Southern backwaters of Kerala on a houseboat at sunset.
India offers an immersive experience, from the mystical Himalayas in the North at
[Ananda Spa](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreat-offers/ananda-in-the-himalayas/), to the endless white beaches in the South. People from all corners of the earth flock to India to experience a deeper connection with self, through cultural experiences and wellness retreats. Stay in a luxury ashram and learn organic gardening, yoga and meditation or check into a [Maharajaâ€™s Estate](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreat-offers/ananda-in-the-himalayas/) overlooking spiritual Rishikesh and the Ganges at Ananda Spa. Here you can experience all manner of health retreats, from [ Detox](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/ananda-detox-luxury-india/), [Ayurveda](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/ananda-ayurveda-luxury-india/), [Fitness](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/ananda-fitness-holidays-india/), [Weight Loss](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/ananda-weight-loss-india/) to [Self-Realisation](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/ananda-luxury-meditation-india/). Travel to Rajasthan to experience a personal [Detox vacation](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/aman-detox-india-luxury/)Â or balance with Doshas with [Ayurveda](https://soul-sanctuaries.com/retreats/amanbagh-ayurveda-india/) at luxury Amanbagh resort.
